questions.question_text: Who may refuse to grant the authorization or revoke, suspend, or refuse to renew an authorization, if the authorization holder is in contravention of this Act?

options.A: Minister of Consumer and Commercial Relations
options.C: TSSA Fuel Safety Inspector

questions.question_text: Who may only use force to enter and inspect a place where there is an immediate threat to public safety and only such force that is reasonably necessary in the circumstances?

options.A: Gas Technician 2
options.C: TSSA Inspector

questions.question_text: Who shall order such investigation as he or she considers necessary on being notified of an accident or incident?

options.A: Employer of Gas Technician
options.C: TSSA Inspector

questions.question_text: Every ___________ shall take all reasonable precautions to ensure that they and their agents and employees comply with this Act, the regulations or a Ministers order

options.A: TSSA Director
options.C: Employer

questions.question_text: Who is the "authority having jurisdiction" referenced in the Code for Ontario

options.A: Ministry of Training, Colleges, Universities
options.C: Ministry of Labour

questions.question_text: An automatically controlled forced air furnace shall be equipped with a high temperature limit control, the maximum setting of the control shall be?

options.A: 200 degrees F
options.C: 300 degrees F

questions.question_text: What is the maximum gas pressure allowed in a building under construction (construction heater application)?

options.A: 2 PSIG
options.C: 25 PSIG

questions.question_text: A Notice of Proposal is not required to be provided by TSSA when?

options.A: When certification is being suspended due to negligence
options.C: When suspending a certification due to failure to pay certification fees

questions.question_text: Which certification agency listed is not certified for appliance approvals in Ontario?

options.A: Ministry of Transportation
options.C: Underwriters Laboratories Canada

questions.question_text: Welded gas piping must comply with?

options.A: Transport of Dangerous Goods Regulations
options.C: TIG and MIG Welding Act

questions.question_text: A Technician not agreeing with a Directors ruling may?

options.A: Continue performing duties as a Gas Technician
options.B: Appeal to the Director of Fuels Safety at TSSA
options.C: Appeal to the Director of TSSA
options.D: Appeal to the Ontario Divisional Court

questions.question_text: A person might be refused authorization where?

options.A: The person is not qualified
options.B: The person resides in another Province or Territory
options.C: The person resides in another country
options.D: The person is qualified in another Province or Territory

questions.question_text: A Safety Order can be given?

options.A: In writing only
options.C: Only after a hearing has taken place
options.D: Only after prior notice has been given

questions.question_text: No person shall remove a seal affixed by an Inspector:

options.A: Without consent from the Director of Fuel Safety TSSA
options.B: Without the consent of the Distributor
options.C: Without the consent of the TSSA Fuel Safety Inspector who affixed the seal

questions.question_text: The maximum fine for contravention of the Acts and Regulations for an individual is?
A Hydrocarbon is defined as?

options.A: Chemical compound of Hydro electricity and Water
options.B: Chemical compound of Hydrogen and Carbon Dioxide
options.C: Chemical compound of Hydrogen and Carbon Monoxide
options.D: Chemical compound of Hydrogen and Carbon

questions.question_text: Who has the responsibility under the Act of Inspecting and Accepting an Installation before supplying gas for the first time?

options.A: TSSA Fuel Safety Inspector
options.C: The Distributor

questions.question_text: No person shall operate a container refill center unless?

options.A: The operator of the refill center posts a personal bond of $500,000
options.C: The refill center is located more than 0.5 kilometres from a residential area
options.D: The refill center is insured for $2,000,000 liability

questions.question_text: An "indirect fired appliance" is defined as?

options.A: An appliance in which the flue gases are not mixed with the medium being heated
options.B: An appliance in which the flue gases are intermixed with the medium being heated
options.C: An appliance with all combustion air supplied directly from, and all combustion products directly vented to the outdoors by independent enclosed passageways connected directly to the appliance
options.D: An appliance with storage capability only, and where heat is transferred from one heating medium to another

questions.question_text: A "service regulator" is defined as?

options.A: Pressure regulator located in the valve train of an appliance
options.B: Pressure regulator located between the utility owned regulator and the       appliance regulator
options.C: Pressure regulator installed on a service line to control the pressure of the gas delivered to the customer
options.D: Overpressure protection device that functions by discharging gas from the downstream system

questions.question_text: A proved pilot is?

options.A: A pilot flame supervised by a primary safety control that senses the presence of a pilot prior to gas being admitted to the main burner
options.B: A pilot flame that burns without turndown throughout the entire time the burner is in service, whether the main burner is firing or not
options.C: A pilot that is automatically lighted each time there is a call for heat and that is cut off automatically at the end of the trial for ignition period of the main burner
options.D: A pilot that is automatically lighted each time there is a call for heat and that burns during the entire period that the main burner is firing

questions.question_text: A stop fill valve is?

options.A: A valve that automatically shuts off the supply of gas when de-energized by a combustion safety control, safety limit control, or loss of an actuating medium
options.B: A manually operated, lubricated plug type, quarter turn valve that has stops in the open and closed positions and has an attached handle or loose fitting key or extended handle wrench, and that is located downstream of all safety shut off valves on the valve train and as close to the burner as practicable
options.C: A relief valve installed in the piping or tubing system downstream of a final stage pressure regulator that is not equipped with an internal relief valve
options.D: A device in a container that is intended to automatically shut off the flow of liquid into the container when a predetermined fixed level is achieved

questions.question_text: Induced draft is?

options.A: A mechanical draft produced by a device upstream from the combustion zone of an appliance
options.B: A mechanical draft produced by a device downstream from the combustion zone of an appliance
options.C: A draft other than a mechanical draft
options.D: A draft produced by a mechanical device, such as a fan, blower, or aspirator, that can supplement natural draft
